results.name: Wanda Maximoff
results.description: Notably powerful, Wanda Maximoff has fought both against and with the Avengers, attempting to hone her abilities and do what she believes is right to help the world.

results.name: Black Widow
results.description: Natasha Romanoff, separated from the now-fractured Avengers, confronts the dark path she took to becoming a spy and assassin, as well as events that followed.

results.name: Loki
